meanings.sent1: I have two avos in my garden.
meanings.sent2: The avos on the tree are ripe for picking.
meanings.sent3: The avos had a party while we were away.
meanings.sent4: The avos stood tall like guardians of the orchard.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant green color of the avos caught my eye.

meanings.sent1: I love adding avos to my salads.
meanings.sent2: The grocery store had a sale on avos.
meanings.sent3: The avos were feeling a bit squishy today.
meanings.sent4: Her skin was as smooth as an avo.
meanings.sent5: The creamy texture of avos makes them perfect for guacamole.
